t = int(input())
while t != 0:
    n = int(input())
    if n == 2:
        print(-1)
        t = t - 1
        continue
    l = []
    if n % 2 == 1:
        for i in range(1, n + 1):
            l.append(i)
        print(*l)
    else:
        x = 1
        for i in range(0, n):
            l.append(x)
            x = x + 1
        l[0] = 2
        l[1] = 3
        l[2] = 1
        print(*l)
    t = t - 1

t = input()
for c in range(0, int(t)):
    n = int(input())
    res = []
    for i in range(n):
        res.append(i + 1)
    if n == 2:
        print(-1)
    elif n % 2 == 0:
        temp = res[-1]
        res[-1] = res[-3]
        res[-3] = temp
        temp = res[-1]
        res[-1] = res[-2]
        res[-2] = temp
        print(*res)
    else:
        print(*res)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    res = []
    for i in range(n):
        res.append(i + 1)
    if n == 2:
        print(-1)
    elif n % 2 == 0:
        temp = res[-1]
        res[-1] = res[-3]
        res[-3] = temp
        temp = res[-1]
        res[-1] = res[-2]
        res[-2] = temp
        print(*res)
    else:
        print(*res)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    if n == 2:
        print(-1)
    elif n % 2:
        arr = [i for i in range(1, n + 1)]
        print(*arr)
    else:
        arr = [i for i in range(1, n + 1)]
        arr[0] = 2
        arr[1] = 3
        arr[2] = 1
        print(*arr)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    if n == 2:
        print(-1)
    elif n % 2 == 1:
        a = list(range(1, n + 1))
        print(*a)
        continue
    elif n == 4:
        a = [2, 3, 1, 4]
        print(*a)
        continue
    else:
        a = [2, 3, 1, 4]
        b = list(range(5, n + 1))
        a.extend(b)
        print(*a)
